segments.text: Do you want an IBM-compatible PC or a Macintosh ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure . What's the difference ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , what do you plan to use your computer for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mostly just to browse the Internet and send emails to friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then a PC should be enough . Macintoshes are better for graphics , but they also cost a bit more .
segments.speaker: S1
